title: Tortona Around Design font
content:
[http://www.tortonaroundesign.com/static/img/tortona-around-design-logo1.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317205649/http:/www.tortonaroundesign.com/static/img/tortona-around-design-logo1.png)

The most evident feature of the font is the inclined bar of the "A" and the "R"

Thank you!

Font: 

 Track

comments.content:
Very similar: Gumpita Rahayu, Track

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317205649im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tort1_5363.jpg)
 but the numbers are wrong: 
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317205649im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tort2_6045.jpg)

Confirming Dick 'Track' ;)  
Link to the font: [http://fontfabric.com/track-free-font/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317205649/http:/fontfabric.com/track-free-font/ "http://fontfabric.com/track-free-font/")
Thank you very much! The numbers are in a different font ;)
